claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote states that the trivalent Flublok vaccine contained 45 mcg of hemagglutinin (HA) per strain, directly supporting the claim about Flublok's HA content.
